dict.acceptation: 不确定，不能肯定或怀疑；

sent.orig: No doubt, my boy, no doubt.
The essence of Descartes' general doubt is not noumenon doubt but methodological one.
sent.trans: 笛卡尔普遍怀疑方法的实质是方法论意义上的怀疑，而非本体论意义上的怀疑。

sent.orig: Beyond all doubt (ie There can't be any doubt that) changes are coming.
Despite his assurance, I doubt him. In spite of his assurance, I doubt him.
sent.trans: 虽然他提出保证，我仍然怀疑他。

sent.orig: Skepticism means not intellectual Doubt alone, but moral Doubt; all sorts of infidelity, insincerity, spiritual paralysis.
sent.trans: 怀疑主义不仅是指知识方面的怀疑，连道德层面，如诸般背叛、虚情假意、精神上的麻痹等等，也都无法幸免。
